hero.paragraph: I build performant systems that elevate user experience and product scalability.

about.title: ABOUT
about.paragraph1: A software engineer passionate about building scalable systems that directly improve product performance and user experience.  I thrive in collaborative environments, solving complex problems with clean, efficient code and bring a balance of speed, quality, and impact.
about.paragraph2: I have built and shipped robust frontend and backend applications using javascript frameworks like React, Nextjs, Angular and Go(Golang). I'm currently building a payment platform infrastructure using a micro-services design architecture and have been expanding gradually into AI product development
about.paragraph3: I’m also actively building my presence in the tech community. With over 1000+ followers on X, I’ve learned and connected with top minds, mentors in the indie hacker and maker space.

experience.tasks: Led the development of scalable frontend architecture using Angular and a NestJS middleware for data routing. Built reusable UI components, implemented robust form validation, and integrated API/state management. Established CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment, and collaborated cross-functionally in agile teams to deliver key features.
